name: KITCHENARM 29-in-1 SMART Bread Machine with Gluten Free Setting 2LB 1.5LB 1LB Bread Maker Machine with Homemade Cycle - Stainless Steel Breadmaker with Recipes Whole Wheat Bread Making Machine
short_description: 29-in-1 SMART BREAD MACHINE FOR NEWBIES & PROS - Your fresh healthy homemade bread is clicks away: just pick one of the many provided recipes or your own favorite recipe, and click a few buttons. - 29 Automatic Programs include 21 Bread Menus (Basic White, Sweet, French, Whole Wheat, Rye, Keto, Gluten Free, Sourdough..), 7 Non Bread Menus (Cake, Jam, Yogurt, Dough..), and the Fully Customizable Cycle-Level Programming HOME MADE Menu for almost any recipe. - Beginners Friendly & Pros Handy. UNIQUE 1-PRESS BREAD MAKING - All your settings are saved for the next use, including Menu / Loaf Size / Crust Color for a preset menu and your own settings for the HOME MADE menu. - It becomes 1-PRESS operation if you use the same recipe the next time: simply add ingredients and press the START button ONCE. - 29 Menus, 3 Loaf Sizes (1 / 1.5 / 2 LBS), 3 Crust Colors (Dark / Medium / Light), 15-Hour Delay Timer, 1-Hour Keep Warm, 15-Minute Power Interruption Recovery, ADD-NUTS Alarm, etc. MORE MENUS & RECIPES FOR HEALTHY BREADS - KitchenArm Menus & Recipes support both the high gluten bread flour and the less gluten all purpose flour that is inexpensive & healthier yet still makes wonderful breads; they are designed to handle fresh onions, oranges, zucchini, bananas, etc. in the most efficient way, so that the human preparation time is minimized. - Various Gluten Free breads & Whole Wheat bread w/o external gluten - 77 recipes included & hundreds more on KitchenArm Recipe Cloud. FULLY CUSTOMIZABLE CYCLE-LEVEL PROGRAMMING - You can explore your own variants based on a provided recipe for a preset menu, or create YOUR OWN MENU using the cycle-level programming HOME MADE menu (Menu #29) which allows you to specify each bread-making cycle time (KNEAD, REST, RISE, BAKE..) to fully adapt the machine to your own recipes. - It also enables you to utilize hundreds of recipes on KitchenArm Recipe Cloud. - This advanced feature is both Pros Handy and Beginners Friendly. QUALITY BUILD & DEVOTED SERVICES - ETL Certified Kitchen Appliance for US / Canada markets - Accord to US / Canada Power Standard (110V - 130V, 60HZ) - US / Canada Standard Three-Prong Grounding Plug for electric safety - 2.5" Large Visual Digital Display - Food Grade Teflon Coated Non-Stick Bread Pan - 2-YEAR Product Warrantv & LIFETIME Customer Service including Cloud Recipes, Recipe Personalization, etc. - If you intend to use this machine outside North America, please purchase its Europe version (230V, 50HZ) on Amazon UK, amazon.co.uk

name: Bread Machine, Kitchen in the box 2LB 12-IN-1 Bread Maker, Gluten-Free Setting, Auto Fruit Nut Dispenser & Nonstick Pan, 2 Loaf Sizes,13H Reserve & 1H Keep Warm (White)
short_description: 【12 Pre-Programmed Options】Our breadmaker can craft whole wheat, gluten-free bread, and even jam effortlessly. Moreover, you can customize your loaf with three crust shades and sizes (2lb, 1.3lb) with our bread buddy. Perfect for homemade bread lovers, it's not only a dough maker but also a bread oven 【13H Time Delay & 60 Mins Keep Warm Funtion】13H delay time start function allows you to say goodbye to getting up early. All you need to do is to put the ingredients into the bread machine maker before going to bed. Select your desired reservation time. It also has a 60 mins keep warm function to keep the bread hot and tasty. Professional bread maker has a 15 mins power off protection function. Within 15 mins after the power failure, you can connect the power again to resume the program 【Intelligent Fruit and Nut Dispenser & Premium Non-Stick Bread Pan】The bread machine is equipped with a unique removable fruit and nut dispenser that automatically releases ingredients. Simply add the ingredients to the fruit and nut dispenser before making the bread. The removable non-stick bread pan is made of high-quality aluminum alloy, which is resistant to high temperatures, corrosion, and durable. The BPA-free bread pan is easy to clean. Please wipe the outer surface of the bread pan with a cloth before use 【550W Powerful Motor & Unique LCD Display】The homemade bread maker features a 550W powerful motor and 360° heating around the sides of the baking pan, promoting even baking and browning. It accurately senses the dough's temperature and smartly adjusts the heat. The baking process is easily monitored through the LCD digital panel and button controls. Simply press the menu button continuously to cycle through 12 menu options displayed on the LCD screen. The transparent window allows for easy viewing of the entire baking process 【Elegant Exterior Design and Ideal Gift Choice】This bread machine features an elegant and compact design, making it more like a piece of art that fits any kitchen decor and suits any occasion. It is the perfect gift choice for birthdays of women, men, parents, and family, as well as for Mother's Day, Father's Day, Thanksgiving, Christmas, and Valentine's Day. The gluten-free bread machine will allow them to enjoy the fun of making various healthy and fresh breads anytime 【Unmatched Flavor and Excellent Customer Service】This practical bread baking machine is designed with precision baking technology to create soft and fluffy bread while preserving nutrients. It comes with the accessories you need: 1 bread hook, 1 measuring cup, 1 measuring spoon, and 1 manual. KITB offers a 1-year warranty

Enjoy delicious, warm bread with none of the work. 12 programmable settings, including a gluten-free setting, plus customizable loaf sizes and crust colors allow you to bake bread your way.

name: Hamilton Beach Automatic Bread Maker Machine, Digital, Programmable, 12 Settings + Gluten Free, PFAS-Free Nonstick Pan + Kneading Paddle, 2 lb Capacity, Black
short_description: EASY FRESH BREAD: Simply add ingredients, select the cycle, and press start to make homemade bread with ease using this Hamilton Beach bread machine. VERSATILE WITH 12 CYCLES: Make delicious, mouth-watering loaves of bread or prepare dough for pizza and dinner rolls. Cycles include basic, French, gluten-free, whole grain, 1.5 lb. express, 2.0 lb. express, sweet, dough, dough, roast nuts, jam and bake. CUSTOMIZE YOUR LOAF: Create 1 lb., 1.5 lb., or 2 lb. loaves with three crust settings for light, medium, or dark crusts with this bread maker machine. The ultimate bread making gift for the bakers in your life. BEEPS WHEN IT'S TIME FOR ADD-INS: Before the second kneading cycle, the bread machine beeps to let you know it's time to add fruit, nuts, seeds or other add-ins to the dough. EASILY PROGRAM: Use the digital display with countdown timer to choose your settings and monitor the baking time with this Hamilton Beach bread maker. Automatic keep warm keeps the bread warm for 1 hour after baking.
product_description: This Hamilton Beach Bread Maker Machine helps you craft homemade bread with ease. This bread maker machine allows you to enjoy homemade loaves in just three simple steps: add ingredients, select a cycle, and press start. It boasts 12 versatile cycles, including basic, French, and gluten-free bread options, making it a great gluten free bread maker for diverse dietary needs. Whether you’re making a 1 lb., 1.5 lb., or 2 lb. loaf, the adjustable crust settings help your bread turn out just the way you like it. Designed with user-friendly functionality, this bread making machine features a digital display with a countdown timer for easy programming and monitoring of your baking progress. Add it to your list of gifts for bread bakers! Before the second kneading cycle, a helpful beep prompts you to add any extra ingredients like fruits, nuts, or seeds, enhancing the flavor and nutrition of your creations. With its PFAS-free nonstick pan and kneading paddle, cleanup is a breeze.

name: KITCHENARM 19-in-1 HANDY Bread Machine with Homemade Cycle and Gluten Free Setting - Beginner Friendly 2LB 1.5LB 1LB White Bread Maker Machine with Recipes and Delay Timer
short_description: BEGINNER FRIENDLY 19-in-1 SMART BREADMAKER - Even if you are a complete novice, your first homemade loaf will be an easy success: just pick a recipe, add the ingredients, and press a few buttons. - 19 Preset Menus include: 11 Bread Menus (Basic White, Sweet, French, Whole Wheat, Gluten Free, Multigrain, Sourdough..), 7 Non Bread Menus (Cake, Jam, Yogurt, Dough..), and the fully programmable HOME MADE menu. - 57 recipes in the included recipe book & hundreds more on KitchenArm Recipe Cloud. INSTANT BREAD & 1-PRESS OPERATION - Support most pre-packaged bread mixes for instant bread: no more ingredient hunting or measuring. - All your settings are saved for the next use: Menu / Loaf Size / Crust Color. - It becomes 1-PRESS operation if you use the same recipe the next time: just add the ingredients and press the START button. - 3 Loaf Sizes, 3 Crust Colors, 15-Hour Delay Timer, ADD-NUTS / REMOVE-PADDLE Alarms, etc. - You can even control each cycle time of a running menu ON THE GO. ADDED VALUES FOR HEALTHY BREADS - Homemade bread is healthier than store bought, yet more can be done. - Most bread machine recipes call for the expensive high-gluten bread flour, but excess gluten intake can cause health issues. We support bread flour as well as all purpose flour that is inexpensive with less gluten yet still makes wonderful breads. - More health benefits: 100% Whole Wheat bread without added gluten, various Gluten Free breads, many healthy recipes on KitchenArm Recipe Cloud.. FRESH VEGETABLES & FULLY PROGRAMMABLE - For better flavors and nutrition, we often use fresh vegetables and fruits in our recipes. - KitchenArm recipes are specially designed to handle fresh onions, oranges, potatoes, zucchini, overripe bananas, etc. in the most efficient way. - The fully programmable HOME MADE menu (Menu #19) allows you to specify each bread-making cycle time (KNEAD, REST, RISE, BAKE..) to adapt the machine to your own recipes or explore the endless bread making possibilities. QUALITY BUILD & SLEEK DESIGN & DEVOTED SERVICES - ETL Certified Appliance for US / Canada markets including 3-Prong Grounding Plug for electric safety & longer product lifespan - Accord to US / Canada Power Standard (110V-130V, 60HZ) - White pleasant PP exterior body, Silver PP control panel, Stainless Steel Lid, and Food Grade Teflon Coated Non-Stick Bread Pan - 2-YEAR Product VVarranty & LIFETIME Customer Service including Cloud Recipes, Recipe Customization, etc.
